alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dooly; Pulaski; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 8:12AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pulaski, Wilcox, eastern Dooly and Crisp Counties through 845 AM EST... At 812 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Richwood to near Sibley, and moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Hawkinsville, Vienna, Abbeville, Rochelle, Arabi, Pineview, Pinehurst, Pitts, Browndale, Richwood, Mobley Crossing, Mock Springs, Seville, Ocmulgee Banks, Finleyson, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Pleasant View, Tippettville and Raines. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
